# `pitchfork boot`

- **Usage**: `pitchfork boot <SUBCOMMAND>`

Enable or disable boot start

## Subcommands

- [`pitchfork boot disable`](/cli/boot/disable.md)
- [`pitchfork boot enable`](/cli/boot/enable.md)
- [`pitchfork boot status`](/cli/boot/status.md)
